message.body: Dear Sofie, how's everything? I wanna let you know that I can't go to school today because my boyfriend is sick and wants me to be home with him. He is too weak to talk and move so he now asks me for water/food by knocking the wall
that does not sound fun for you
Friday is not a good day for me
but ill be there Monday March 9th...
No no I laugh at him too haha
hahaha... i am too! my boyfriend always wants sympathy and instead i tell him that he is being a baby and it’s all in his head!
then he gets really mad and hangs up on me
eeks! but he loves me despite my lack of empathy
Hahaha you're a really bad girlfriend!!
i am! but it works for us both

Hmmm maybe I should try... But yesterday I let him at home cuz I had to bring something to your new place (we're supposed to move this week...) I was only out for 3 hours and he called with a dying voice that I couldn't barely recognize and said "When are you coming home?! I'm dying...." I was like what?! I'm only out for 3 hours!
